design_philosophy.vibe: Calm Authority. The interface should feel like a breath of fresh air (literally, using the airy cyan palette) but grounded in absolute truth (data precision).
anti_patterns: No dark mode for the public portal (transparency = light).

citizen_portal.hero_section: min-h-[80vh] flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden

official_dashboard.sidebar: w-64 fixed inset-y-0 left-0 z-50 bg-white border-r border-slate-100

Card.base: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

Button.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50

Badge.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on #E3FDFD is Slate-900 or darker. White text on #71C9CE is borderline - use bold weight or darken the button slightly on hover.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Use the 'Manrope' font from Google Fonts (via import in index.css).
3. Implement the 'Citizen Portal' as the index route ('/').
4. Implement the 'Official Dashboard' as a protected route ('/official').
5. Use the provided hex codes EXACTLY. Do not deviate to Tailwind defaults for the primary colors.
6. For the 'Fraud Risk Score', use a circular progress indicator with color coding (Red=High, Green=Low).
7. Ensure the 'Report Fraud' form is anonymous-first (no login required by default).
8. Use 'sonner' for all toast notifications (success/error states).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
